Content: Separating the defines into their own add on then requiring that add-on in your mod is better for cross mod detection though, since just adding it to each module will mean any mods that loaded before yours will not see your define and if you have required add ons that can mess up load order. By separating it out then requiring it will mean the defines are loaded first then the mods, meaning you can have multiple mods all detect eachother without having any particular load order.

Content:
Question would have fit more in #server-help-dayz 
Old, deprecated server config parameter
Go to ecenomy.xml and change the building line to
```xml
<building init="0" load="1" respawn="0" save="1"/>
```
The init parameter randomizes everything except locked doors, save and load enables saving and loading of the state
